headline: Mixed Results, but Strong Outlook, for Home Depot and Macy’s

headline: Robert Rickel, a Founder of Hardware Supermarkets, Dies at 90

headline: Home Depot Leads Weak Retail Sector Ahead of Spring Spending Thaw

headline: Retailers Report Earnings in a Subdued Season

headline: Two Good Omens for Housing Market

headline: Home Depot Chooses Insider for Its New Chief Executive

headline: Wall Street Slips Lower as Shares In Apple Fall After Product News

headline: Ex-Employees Say Home Depot Left Data Vulnerable

headline: Retailers’ Earnings, Fed Minutes and a Panel on Wall St.

headline: Home Depot Posts a Strong 3rd Quarter Despite a Data Breach Disclosure

headline: West Coast Port Gridlock Hits Inventory at Macy’s and Home Depot

headline: Home Depot Says It Will Phase Out Chemical Used in Vinyl Flooring

headline: Earnings From Walmart and More Big Retailers; Wall Street’s Annual Meetings

headline: Hackers Go After Little Fish, Too, While Trawling for Credit Cards

headline: Home Depot to Buy Interline Brands for $1.6 Billion in Cash

headline: Strong Sales at Walmart, Home Depot and TJX
